_sText:
Quick and easy minigame map.

GRENADE DROP!

2 T's Spawn Above 30 CT's With A Good Supply Of Nades

Goal: T's - Kill Ct's With Nades
      CT's - Dodge And Survive :3

Don't Worry About The Floor, The Nades Will Go Through The Glass

Now, I Know I Could Have Made Nade Dispensers But After Testing, T's Kick The CT's Ass So I Made Them Run To Kill A Bit More Time

Thanks to:

Tom Green - Helping with floor trick
VP Agnew - Idea
T-Party - Custom Decals

You Need NOBLOCK (It Would Help)

If T's Cannot Kill All T's In 60 Seconds They DIE :3

Report Any Bad News About This Map Thank you

BTW I Think His Name Is Tophatwaffle or something I Stole Your nade from your deathrun msg me if you want me to take it away or credit which im giving you atm :3
